history.proof: intros o1 o2 e1 e2 Hsub. split. - unfold subsume in Hsub. specialize (Hsub 0). unfold osub in Hsub. qsimpl time: 1. - unfold subsume in Hsub. intros x. specialize (Hsub (S x)). apply Hsub.

ctx: intros o1 o2 e1 e2 Hsub.
exceptions.exn: In environment A : Type sub : A -> A -> Prop sub_reflexive : forall a : A, sub a a sub_transitive : forall a1 a2 a3 : A, sub a1 a2 -> sub a2 a3 -> sub a1 a3 o1, o2 : option A e1, e2 : list (option A) Hsub : forall a2 : A, lookup 0 (o2 :: e2) = Some a2 -> exists a1 : A, lookup 0 (o1 :: e1) = Some a1 /\\ sub a1 a2 Unable to unify "exists a1 : A, lookup 0 (o1 :: e1) = Some a1 /\\ sub a1 ?M1656" with "forall a2 : A, o2 = Some a2 -> exists a1 : A, o1 = Some a1 /\\ sub a1 a2".

ctx: intros o1 o2 e1 e2 Hsub.
exceptions.exn: No such goal. Focus next goal with bullet -.

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
A: Type
sub: A -> A -> Prop
sub_reflexive: forall a : A, sub a a
sub_transitive: forall a1 a2 a3 : A, sub a1 a2 -> sub a2 a3 -> sub a1 a3

Goal:
forall (o1 o2 : option A) (e1 e2 : list (option A)), subsume (o1 :: e1) (o2 :: e2) -> osub o1 o2 /\ subsume e1 e2

Premises:
Inductive option (A : Type) : Type := Some : A -> option A | None : option A Arguments option _%type_scope Arguments Some {A}%type_scope a : rename Arguments None {A}%type_scope
osub = fun o1 o2 : option A => forall a2 : A, o2 = Some a2 -> exists a1 : A, o1 = Some a1 /\ sub a1 a2 : option A -> option A -> Prop
Inductive list (A : Type) : Type := nil : list A | cons : A -> list A -> list A Arguments list _%type_scope Arguments nil {A}%type_scope Arguments cons {A}%type_scope a l%list_scope : rename
subsume = fun e1 e2 : env A => forall x : nat, osub (lookup x e1) (lookup x e2) : env A -> env A -> Prop
subsume_insert : forall e1 e2 : env A, subsume e1 e2 -> forall (x : nat) (o1 o2 : option A), osub o1 o2 -> subsume (raw_insert x o1 e1) (raw_insert x o2 e2)

snd : ?A * ?B -> ?B where ?A : [A : Type sub : A -> A -> Prop sub_reflexive : forall a : A, sub a a sub_transitive : forall a1 a2 a3 : A, sub a1 a2 -> sub a2 a3 -> sub a1 a3 |- Type] ?B : [A : Type sub : A -> A -> Prop sub_reflexive : forall a : A, sub a a sub_transitive : forall a1 a2 a3 : A, sub a1 a2 -> sub a2 a3 -> sub a1 a3 |- Type]

None : option ?A where ?A : [A : Type sub : A -> A -> Prop sub_reflexive : forall a : A, sub a a sub_transitive : forall a1 a2 a3 : A, sub a1 a2 -> sub a2 a3 -> sub a1 a3 |- Type]
Some : ?A -> option ?A where ?A : [A : Type sub : A -> A -> Prop sub_reflexive : forall a : A, sub a a sub_transitive : forall a1 a2 a3 : A, sub a1 a2 -> sub a2 a3 -> sub a1 a3 |- Type]
Tauto.ocons : option ?A -> list ?A -> list ?A where ?A : [A : Type sub : A -> A -> Prop sub_reflexive : forall a : A, sub a a sub_transitive : forall a1 a2 a3 : A, sub a1 a2 -> sub a2 a3 -> sub a1 a3 |- Type]
Tauto.cons_id : option ?AF -> list ?AF -> list ?AF where ?AF : [A : Type sub : A -> A -> Prop sub_reflexive : forall a : A, sub a a sub_transitive : forall a1 a2 a3 : A, sub a1 a2 -> sub a2 a3 -> sub a1 a3 |- Type]
nil : list ?A where ?A : [A : Type sub : A -> A -> Prop sub_reflexive : forall a : A, sub a a sub_transitive : forall a1 a2 a3 : A, sub a1 a2 -> sub a2 a3 -> sub a1 a3 |- Type]
osub_Some_inversion : forall (o1 : option A) (a2 : A), osub o1 (Some a2) -> exists a1 : A, o1 = Some a1 /\ sub a1 a2
VarMap.Empty : VarMap.t ?A where ?A : [A : Type sub : A -> A -> Prop sub_reflexive : forall a : A, sub a a sub_transitive : forall a1 a2 a3 : A, sub a1 a2 -> sub a2 a3 -> sub a1 a3 |- Type]

VarMap.Elt : ?A -> VarMap.t ?A where ?A : [A : Type sub : A -> A -> Prop sub_reflexive : forall a : A, sub a a sub_transitive : forall a1 a2 a3 : A, sub a1 a2 -> sub a2 a3 -> sub a1 a3 |- Type]
cons : ?A -> list ?A -> list ?A where ?A : [A : Type sub : A -> A -> Prop sub_reflexive : forall a : A, sub a a sub_transitive : forall a1 a2 a3 : A, sub a1 a2 -> sub a2 a3 -> sub a1 a3 |- Type]
VarMap.Branch : VarMap.t ?A -> ?A -> VarMap.t ?A -> VarMap.t ?A where ?A : [A : Type sub : A -> A -> Prop sub_reflexive : forall a : A, sub a a sub_transitive : forall a1 a2 a3 : A, sub a1 a2 -> sub a2 a3 -> sub a1 a3 |- Type]
subsume_cons : forall (o : option A) (e1 e2 : env A), osub o (lookup 0 e2) -> subsume e1 (tl e2) -> subsume (o :: e1) e2
osub_Some_Some : forall a1 a2 : A, sub a1 a2 -> osub (Some a1) (Some a2)
osub_transitive : forall o1 o2 o3 : option A, osub o1 o2 -> osub o2 o3 -> osub o1 o3
subsume_transitive : forall e1 e2 e3 : env A, subsume e1 e2 -> subsume e2 e3 -> subsume e1 e3
osub_None_Some : forall a2 : A, osub None (Some a2) -> False
Relation_Operators.Ltl_ind : forall (A : Set) (leA : A -> A -> Prop) (P : list A -> list A -> Prop), (forall (a : A) (x : list A), P nil (a :: x)) -> (forall a b : A, leA a b -> forall x y : list A, P (a :: x) (b :: y)) -> (forall (a : A) (x y : list A), Relation_Operators.Ltl A leA x y -> P x y -> P (a :: x) (a :: y)) -> forall l l0 : list A, Relation_Operators.Ltl A leA l l0 -> P l l0
Relation_Operators.Ltl_sind : forall (A : Set) (leA : A -> A -> Prop) (P : list A -> list A -> SProp), (forall (a : A) (x : list A), P nil (a :: x)) -> (forall a b : A, leA a b -> forall x y : list A, P (a :: x) (b :: y)) -> (forall (a : A) (x y : list A), Relation_Operators.Ltl A leA x y -> P x y -> P (a :: x) (a :: y)) -> forall l l0 : list A, Relation_Operators.Ltl A leA l l0 -> P l l0
Add_sind : forall (A : Type) (a : A) (P : list A -> list A -> SProp), (forall l : list A, P l (a :: l)) -> (forall (x : A) (l l' : list A), Add a l l' -> P l l' -> P (x :: l) (x :: l')) -> forall l l0 : list A, Add a l l0 -> P l l0
Add_ind : forall (A : Type) (a : A) (P : list A -> list A -> Prop), (forall l : list A, P l (a :: l)) -> (forall (x : A) (l l' : list A), Add a l l' -> P l l' -> P (x :: l) (x :: l')) -> forall l l0 : list A, Add a l l0 -> P l l0
Inductive Ltl (A : Set) (leA : A -> A -> Prop) : list A -> list A -> Prop := Lt_nil : forall (a : A) (x : list A), Relation_Operators.Ltl A leA nil (a :: x) | Lt_hd : forall a b : A, leA a b -> forall x y : list A, Relation_Operators.Ltl A leA (a :: x) (b :: y) | Lt_tl : forall (a : A) (x y : list A), Relation_Operators.Ltl A leA x y -> Relation_Operators.Ltl A leA (a :: x) (a :: y) Arguments Relation_Operators.Ltl _%type_scope _%function_scope (_ _)%list_scope Arguments Relation_Operators.Lt_nil _%type_scope _%function_scope _ _%list_scope Arguments Relation_Operators.Lt_hd _%type_scope _%function_scope _ _ _ (_ _)%list_scope Arguments Relation_Operators.Lt_tl _%type_scope _%function_scope _ (_ _)%list_scope
Inductive Add (A : Type) (a : A) : list A -> list A -> Prop := Add_head : forall l : list A, Add a l (a :: l) | Add_cons : forall (x : A) (l l' : list A), Add a l l' -> Add a (x :: l) (x :: l') Arguments Add [A]%type_scope _ (_ _)%list_scope Arguments Add_head [A]%type_scope _ _%list_scope Arguments Add_cons [A]%type_scope [a] _ [l l']%list_scope
app_eq_unit : forall (A : Type) (x y : list A) (a : A), x ++ y = a :: nil -> x = nil /\ y = a :: nil \/ x = a :: nil /\ y = nil
Relation_Operators.Desc_sind : forall (A : Set) (leA : A -> A -> Prop) (P : list A -> SProp), P nil -> (forall x : A, P (x :: nil)) -> (forall (x y : A) (l : list A), Relation_Operators.clos_refl A leA x y -> Relation_Operators.Desc A leA (l ++ y :: nil) -> P (l ++ y :: nil) -> P ((l ++ y :: nil) ++ x :: nil)) -> forall l : list A, Relation_Operators.Desc A leA l -> P l
Relation_Operators.Desc_ind : forall (A : Set) (leA : A -> A -> Prop) (P : list A -> Prop), P nil -> (forall x : A, P (x :: nil)) -> (forall (x y : A) (l : list A), Relation_Operators.clos_refl A leA x y -> Relation_Operators.Desc A leA (l ++ y :: nil) -> P (l ++ y :: nil) -> P ((l ++ y :: nil) ++ x :: nil)) -> forall l : list A, Relation_Operators.Desc A leA l -> P l
Refl.make_conj_cons : forall (A : Type) (eval : A -> Prop) (a : A) (l : list A), Refl.make_conj eval (a :: l) < -> eval a /\ Refl.make_conj eval l
nth_error_split : forall (A : Type) (l : list A) (n : nat) (a : A), nth_error l n = Some a -> exists l1 l2 : list A, l = l1 ++ a :: l2 /\ length l1 = n
Exists_ind : forall (A : Type) (P : A -> Prop) (P0 : list A -> Prop), (forall (x : A) (l : list A), P x -> P0 (x :: l)) -> (forall (x : A) (l : list A), Exists P l -> P0 l -> P0 (x :: l)) -> forall l : list A, Exists P l -> P0 l
Exists_sind : forall (A : Type) (P : A -> Prop) (P0 : list A -> SProp), (forall (x : A) (l : list A), P x -> P0 (x :: l)) -> (forall (x : A) (l : list A), Exists P l -> P0 l -> P0 (x :: l)) -> forall l : list A, Exists P l -> P0 l
app_inj_tail : forall (A : Type) (x y : list A) (a b : A), x ++ a :: nil = y ++ b :: nil -> x = y /\ a = b

```coq
intros o1 o2 e1 e2 Hsub.
split.
- unfold subsume in Hsub. specialize (Hsub 0).
  unfold osub in Hsub. apply Hsub. reflexivity.
- unfold subsume in Hsub. intros x. specialize (Hsub (S x)).
  exact Hsub.
Qed.
```
